text: #Ohio has 25 approved conditions for #MedicalMarijuana, from #HIV to #cancer to #Alzheimers to #MultipleSclerosis. If docs want to recommend #cannabis in OH they must learn about its efficacy for these conditions through at least 2 hrs CME. Get it here: https://t.co/13SJNc7sUh https://t.co/brAxiNjBpT
